function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases in overcrowded housing conditions due to inadequate housing","Impact":"Spread of infectious diseases and increased public health risk","Mitigation":"Improving housing conditions, providing access to healthcare, and promoting hygiene practices","Technologies":"Smart home devices for monitoring and controlling indoor air quality","People":"Individuals living in overcrowded or inadequate housing, public health","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Social harm from lack of wholesome food and exposure to various forms of danger","Impact":"Poor physical and mental health, increased risk of malnutrition and illness","Mitigation":"Promoting access to nutritious food, addressing social inequalities, and enhancing community safety measures","Technologies":"Food distribution technologies, community safety apps, social welfare programs","People":"Individuals with inadequate access to food and exposure to danger, marginalized communities","Owner":"Community organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Structural context of social problems contributing to preventable harm","Impact":"Inequities in access to basic needs, increased vulnerability to harm and victimization","Mitigation":"Addressing systemic social inequalities, implementing social welfare policies, and promoting community empowerment","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying social inequalities, digital platforms for social welfare services","People":"Marginalized communities, individuals affected by social inequalities","Owner":"Government, social welfare organizations"}]}
